column2: BRIEF-JBT Corp Reports Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.34 From Continuing Operations Excluding Items May 1 (Reuters) - John Bean Technologies Corp: * Q1 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.34 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS EXCLUDING ITEMS * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.36 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $1.82 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FORECASTS DILUTED EPS FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS OF $2.80 - $3.00 OR $3.95 - $4.15 ON AN ADJUSTED BASIS FOR 2018 * JOHN BEAN TECHNOLOGIES- Q2 EARNINGS FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS ESTIMATED AT $0.80 - $0.87/SHARE, OR $1.00 - $1.07/SHARE, ADJUSTED FOR RESTRUCTURING CHARGES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
